text: The men's 110 metres hurdles event at the 1998 World Junior Championships in Athletics was held in Annecy, France, at Parc des Sports on 31 July, 1 and 2 August. 106.7cm (3'6) (senior implement) hurdles were used. ==Medalists== {| class="wikitable" style="text-align:center; " width="35%" |- |bgcolor="gold"|Gold|| Staņislavs Olijars ' |- |bgcolor="silver"|Silver|| Sharif Paxton ' |- |bgcolor="CC9966"|Bronze|| Florian Seibold ' |} ==Results== ===Final=== 2 August Wind: -0.2m/s {| class="wikitable sortable" style="text-align:center" |- !Rank !! Name !! Nationality !! Time !!
